alert.note: Alert for Orange; Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Orange and Rockland Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 346 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pomona, or near Sloatsburg, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New City, Haverstraw, Monroe, Sloatsburg, Pomona, Harriman, Kiryas Joel, Stony Point, West Haverstraw, Mount Ivy, Wesley Hills, New Hempstead, Thiells, Fort Montgomery and Tuxedo Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
